TOKYO -- International Olympic Committee President Thomas Bach was supposed to have been the guest of honor at the torch relay in Hiroshima prefecture this week.

articles.author: Nikhil Narain
articles.title: WTC 2021: England Players' Participation In IPL May Mean Advantage New Zealand in WTC Final - News18
articles.description: The participation of England players in the IPL may actually turn out to be advantage New Zealand in the final of the World Test Championship against India starting in Southampton from June 18.
articles.content: The world has truly become global and so has the sport of cricket, especially during these unprecedented times of Covid-19. What happens in one corner of the world positively or adversely affects a c… [+4961 chars]
